Name: Metal World: Street Scraps
About the game: Metal World is a game set in a retrofuturistic world, where the player assembles his vehicle with scrap parts, being able to equip dozens of different combinations, leaving his vehicle with a unique appearance! Explore the world at high speed dodging obstacles, collecting resources and completing your objectives. Gameplay Metal World is an endless running game, where the player depends on his reflexes to avoid obstacles and traps, the gameplay is simple but needs a lot of attention because the vehicle gets faster and faster, the game has 4 difficulties and is ideal both for the more casual players who want to relax and at the same time for players who like challenges and want to test their reflexes and skill to the fullest.
